project.title: Start your projects
project.unlogintopdescription: Start quickly with a few steps to recognize the Nomâ€™s text. Do not need to have an account, but you are limited by model to use. Default is our original model.
project.logintopdescription: You can select one of more models to recognize the Nom's text. Or become a coordinator who can create model by yourself.
project.botunlogindescription1: Get result quickly not need to login
project.botlogindescription1: Custom models and can create one
project.botlogindescription2: Need to send request to admin

login.title: LOGIN INFORMATION
signup.reason-content: Participating in the Han Nom annotation community - FIT will help you improve your ability to work with models. You can create your own training models from your own data set in a short time, or comfortably use models trained by the community under our supervision with data selection.
signup.item1: "Become a Trainer" Create your own training model
signup.item2: Utilize various types of models from the community
signup.item3: Experience our new feature that enhances efficiencys

stepannotate.title: Steps to Annotate Images
stepannotate.step1content: Upload, drag and drop, or copy and paste an image from your computer.
stepannotate.step2content: Annotate the image online with various marks on the toolbar. You can also add notes to your image easily.
stepannotate.step3content: Export to your computer, copy to clipboard, or simply share the image link with others.
